record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, APRIL 14, 2008
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, APRIL 14, 2008 -- (House of Representatives - April 10, 2008)

[Page: H2208]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Monday next for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
